title: Braised Lamb Shank with Vegetable Stew
ingredients: ['7 (450g) lamb shanks', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'water to cover', '675g potatoes, peeled and diced', '675g carrots, peeled and diced', '675g onions, peeled and diced', '30g plain flour', '60g butter, melted', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
